title: Like Mother, Like Daughter
itunes:title: Like Mother, Like Daughter
description:
THU 10/27 - Two generations of hip-hop joined The Breakfast Club this morning, Egypt Criss & Pepa! You know Pepa from "Salt-N-Pepa" and her daughter Egypt is on "Growing Up Hip-Hop". We talk to them about their relationship, how Treach is as her father and whether Pepa wants her daughter to follow in her footsteps. Then a big hee-haw goes to the 76ers for not letting Sevyn Streeter sing the national anthem. She explains why as well...

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
